org.xchain.framework.strategy

Interface ConsumerStrategy<T,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The object type to be constructed by the consumer.
    S - The data source for the consumer.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CatalogConsumerStrategy, TemplatesConsumerStrategy

    public interface ConsumerStrategy<T,S>
    Interface for a Consumer. Consumers will take a resource identified by a systemId and load it from a SourceStrategy. The resource will be parsed and formatted into a proper Object.
    Author:
    Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T consume(java.lang.String systemId, SourceStrategy<S> sourceStrategy, DependencyTracker tracker)
      Load the requested object identified by the given systemId from the given SourceStrategy.

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        T consume(java.lang.String systemId,
        SourceStrategy<S> sourceStrategy,
        DependencyTracker tracker)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the requested object identified by the given systemId from the given SourceStrategy. When loading information from the source the DependencyTracker must be used when resolving Uri's to dependencies.
        Parameters:
        systemId - The identifier for the object to be loaded.
        sourceStrategy - The strategy for getting the source.
        tracker - The dependency tracker.
        Returns:
        The loaded object. Null if no such object could be found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
